name: @dockstat/docknode
description: A remote agent for handling verious tasks in the DockStat eco system. Currently only used for Stack administration.

scripts.publish: bun pm pack --destination ./dist && npm publish --access public ./dist/*.tgz ; rm -r ./dist
scripts.build: rm -r ./dist || true && bun build --target bun --sourcemap=inline --outdir=./dist --minify src/index.ts
scripts.build:docker: bun run build && docker build -t docknode:latest .
